title: Guess what I want to ask!

data.title: Guess what I want to ask!
data.solution:
question_prefix = gets.chomp
n = gets.to_i
f=nil
n.times do
    question = gets.chomp
    if question.start_with? question_prefix 
        puts question
        f=true
    end
end

puts 'EMPTY' unless f
data.statement: Create a suggestion engine that, given a list of pre-defined questions, and a beginning of a question, gives the list of questions starting with the given prefix.

testCases.title: Test 1
testCases.testIn:
how to
4
where is my keys?
how to fix my car?
is it ok to skip boring classes?
how to get a girlfriend?
testCases.testOut:
how to fix my car?
how to get a girlfriend?

data.stubGenerator:
read questionPrefix:string(256)
read N:int
loop N read ROW:string(1024)
write answer
data.inputDescription:
[[question_prefix]] : prefix to lookup in the pre-defined questions.

[[N]] : number of pre-defined questions.

[[N questions]]
data.outputDescription:
List of questions starting with the given prefix [[question_prefix]], having the same order of appearance in the input.
if no question matches the prefix, then just print "<<EMPTY>>"

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

Create a suggestion engine that, given a list of pre-defined questions, and a beginning of a question, gives the list of questions starting with the given prefix.
Input
question_prefix : prefix to lookup in the pre-defined questions.

N : number of pre-defined questions.

N questions
Output
List of questions starting with the given prefix question_prefix, having the same order of appearance in the input.
if no question matches the prefix, then just print "EMPTY"
Constraints
question_prefix : not an empty string
2 ≤ N≤ 100
Example
Input
how to
4
where is my keys?
how to fix my car?
is it ok to skip boring classes?
how to get a girlfriend?
Output
how to fix my car?
how to get a girlfriend?
